name: al-id-range-manager
description: Manage your object ids in Microsoft Business Central.

al-id-range-manager.baseUrlWithoutVersio.title: Base Url
al-id-range-manager.baseUrlWithoutVersio.markdownDescription: Specifies the API Base URL without version (for example: https://{server}:{port}/{instance}/api/teamARTAAAE/extension/). Mandatory for **OnPrem** API.

al-id-range-manager.apiVersion.description: Specifies the API version. Select the highest available version installed on your server.

al-id-range-manager.tenant.title: Tenant
al-id-range-manager.tenant.description: Specifies the tenant on which the API is hosted.

al-id-range-manager.environment.title: Environment
al-id-range-manager.environment.description: Specifies the environment (instance) on which the API is hosted.

al-id-range-manager.companyId.title: Company Id
al-id-range-manager.companyId.description: Specifies the ID of the company for API URL. If connecting to the instance's default company, the field can be blank.

al-id-range-manager.authenticationType.title: Authentication type
al-id-range-manager.authenticationType.markdownDescription: Specifies the API authentication type. **Cloud** API supports **Oauth** only.

al-id-range-manager.username.title: Username
al-id-range-manager.username.markdownDescription: Specifies the username used for API calls when using **OnPrem** API with **Basic** authentication. Mandatory for **OnPrem** API.

al-id-range-manager.password.title: Password
al-id-range-manager.password.markdownDescription: Specifies the password used for API calls when using **OnPrem** API with **Basic** authentication. Mandatory for **OnPrem** API.

commands.title: ALRM: New object extension field or value

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
